__e: Tell me, pretty young lady... Is your father telling the truth?
God says the same thing each time death knocks?
Is he telling the truth, Father, about the dream?
The name rings a bell. What for?
Do any of these names mean anything to you?
Doesn't he have a say in everything?
The name rings a bell. What for?
